history.text: Hi
Hi
Have you heard about any good movies lately?
Do you like superhero movies?
Have you seen Marvel's The Avengers yet?
Sometimes.
No, not yet. Have you?
Who is in it?
Robert Downey Jr. as Iron Man
I like him a lot.
Who else?
Christ Evans as Captain America, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson & Jeremy Renner
I like all of those actors.
What is the plot?
S.H.I.E.L.D. recruits Iron Man, Captain America, the Hulk & Thor to stop Loki from taking over the world.
You know, typical superhero plot
It sounds pretty good I guess.
Did it get good reviews?
Was just looking at some reviews - the critics seem to like it. I just went because my friend wanted to go
Did you like it? Would you recommend it?
I'm not a huge superhero fan, but if you want to stay in & have a movie night at home, it would be good to rent on Netflix or Hulu
So you don't think it's necessary to see on the big screen?
Only for Marvel superhero fans
If you're not a huge fan, I'd wait
Okay, I'm not a big fan. But I heard the Iron Man movies were very good.
It got a Rotton Tomatoes score of 92%
Did the reviews say anything specific about Robert Downey Jr.?
What is the movie rated? PG-13?
It says his character is a team player with 2 superpowers with a sharp tongue
92% is pretty high. Even people who aren't fans of superhero movies would probably like it.
I think it's PG-13 (teeny tiny letters even with the zoom - grrr.)
Okay, thanks. I can take my niece and nephew then.
It looks like we've chatted long enough and can finish the conversation. Thanks for all the information!
Oh, good. Thanks for putting up with me.
It wasn't too bad!
Thank you.

uid1response.feedback: Even though the reviews of the movie were good and I like a lot of the actors in it, I am just not a fan of the Superhero genre in general.

uid2response.feedback: The other user was better at this than I am. Even with the text zoomed in, I still had a hard time reading it. The document was understandable, but I think it would be easier to chat about if it was set-up in sections: (ex.: characters/actors; plot summary; reviews). This would be very helpful especially if you don't like the type of movie you had to discuss. Which reminds me, the pick a movie to discuss disappeared too fast for me to pick one, so we ended up with a randomly assigned movie to discuss.
